result.rule: Numeric semantics is different for integer values (arkts-numeric-semantic)
Numeric semantics is different for integer values (arkts-numeric-semantic)
"@Extend" decorator is not supported (arkui-no-extend-decorator)
"@AnimatableExtend" decorator should be transformed to use receiver (arkui-animatableextend-use-receiver)
Numeric semantics is different for integer values (arkts-numeric-semantic)
"$$" for bidirectional data binding is not supported (arkui-no-$$-bidirectional-data-binding)

autofix.replacementText:
import {
  Entry,
  Component,
  State,
  Column,
  Button,
  Text,
  Row,
  TextAttribute,
  ColumnAttribute,
  AnimatableExtend,
  $$,
  ImageFit,
} from '@kit.ArkUI';

result.rule: The ArkUI interface "Entry" should be imported before it is used (arkui-modular-interface)
